snippet: Wes Welker, a four-time Pro Bowl receiver, was overlooked as a high school senior on National Signing Day.
abstract: Wes Welker, a four-time Pro Bowl receiver, was overlooked as a high school senior on National Signing Day.
lead_paragraph: INDIANAPOLIS - To some football fans, Wednesday is akin to a national holiday. It is the first day that high school seniors are permitted to sign a letter of intent to play college football.

headline.main: Welker Recalls the College Cold Shoulder
